trans-unit.source: Class responsible for runtime binding of the dynamic operations on the dynamic call site.
trans-unit.target: 负责动态调用站点上动态操作的运行时绑定的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallSiteBinder" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An array of arguments to the dynamic operation.
trans-unit.target: 动态操作的参数数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> instances that represent the parameters of the call site in the binding process.
trans-unit.target: 表示绑定进程中调用站点的参数的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression" /> 实例数组。

trans-unit.source: A LabelTarget used to return the result of the dynamic binding.
trans-unit.target: 用于返回动态绑定的结果的 LabelTarget。

trans-unit.source: Performs the runtime binding of the dynamic operation on a set of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 对一组参数执行动态操作的运行时绑定。

trans-unit.source: An Expression that performs tests on the dynamic operation arguments, and performs the dynamic operation if the tests are valid.
trans-unit.target: 一个表达式，对动态操作参数执行测试；如果测试有效，则执行动态操作。

trans-unit.source: If the tests fail on subsequent occurrences of the dynamic operation, Bind will be called again to produce a new <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> for the new argument types.
trans-unit.target: 如果测试在动态操作的后续匹配项上失败，将再次调用 Bind 为新参数类型生成新的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: The target type of the CallSite.
trans-unit.target: 调用站点的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: The CallSite the bind is being performed for.
trans-unit.target: 为其执行绑定的调用站点。

trans-unit.source: The arguments for the binder.
trans-unit.target: 联编程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: Provides low-level runtime binding support.
trans-unit.target: 提供低级别的运行时绑定支持。

trans-unit.source: Classes can override this and provide a direct delegate for the implementation of rule.
trans-unit.target: 类可以对此进行重写，并为规则的实现提供直接委托。

trans-unit.source: This can enable saving rules to disk, having specialized rules available at runtime, or providing a different caching policy.
trans-unit.target: 这样，就可以将规则保存到磁盘，使专用规则在运行时可用，或则提供不同的缓存策略。

trans-unit.source: A new delegate which replaces the CallSite Target.
trans-unit.target: 替换调用站点目标的新委托。

trans-unit.source: The type of target being added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的目标的类型。

trans-unit.source: The target delegate to be added to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到缓存的目标委托。

trans-unit.source: Adds a target to the cache of known targets.
trans-unit.target: 将一个目标添加到已知目标的缓存。

trans-unit.source: The cached targets will be scanned before calling BindDelegate to produce the new rule.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 BindDelegate 生成新规则之前，将扫描已缓存的目标。

trans-unit.source: Gets a label that can be used to cause the binding to be updated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个可用于导致绑定被更新的标签。

trans-unit.source: It indicates that the expression's binding is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 它指示表达式的绑定不再有效。

trans-unit.source: This is typically used when the "version" of a dynamic object has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通常在动态对象的“版本”发生更改时使用它。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> object representing a label that can be used to trigger the binding update.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.LabelTarget" /> 对象，表示可用于触发绑定更新的标签。
